patthana24.11:4.1: Naappaccayaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.11:5.1: Naappaccayaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaccayo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.11:6.1: Nasanidassanaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassano hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.11:7.1: Nasanidassanaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassano nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.11:7.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.11:8.1: Nasappaṭighaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca appaṭigho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.11:9.1: Nasappaṭighaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.11:9.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.11:10.1: Narūpiṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpī hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.11:10.3: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā ekaṃ … pe … purejāte āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.11:11.1: Narūpiṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca arūpī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.11:11.4: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.11:12.1: Nalokiyaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokuttaro hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana24.11:13.1: Nalokuttaraṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana24.11:14.1: Nalokiyaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana24.11:15.1: Nalokuttaraṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca lokiyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṃ.
patthana24.11:15.4: Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate cattāri.
patthana24.11:16.1: Nakenaci viññeyyaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.11:17.1: Nakenaci naviññeyyaṃ nanahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kenaci naviññeyyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
